name: ZendIt
author: Olawoore Emmanuel Collins
description:
ZendIt facilitates P2P sharing and transfer between devices using a websocket server. Also an attempt to simulate popular XenderApp functionality and improvise it by supporting multiple senders and receivers at one go.
    It also support App(Android) to Web / Mobile Browser transfers
    if Receiver has no app installed.

    Features
    Files Transfers and sharing
    Supports downloads on Browser
    if Receivers has no app installed
    Easy to implement
    No permission Required
    Simple Graphical User Interface
